termsAndConditions.name: Data Privacy
termsAndConditions.content:
Privacy Policy

INTRODUCTION

The purpose of this privacy policy ("Privacy Policy") is to describe how AastarUrmika Health Systems Pvt Ltd, ("Aastrika", "us", "we" or "our") collects, uses, transfers, shares and maintains Information (as defined hereafter) about the Users (as defined hereafter) of its digital platform ("Platform") and the Creators of the User Content (as defined hereafter) on the Platform. Capitalised terms not defined herein shall have the same meaning as those ascribed to them in the Terms of Use.

For the purposes of this Privacy Policy, Users and Creators shall collectively be referred to as "you" and "your".

At Aastrika, we respect your privacy. We want to ensure that you get the information, content, and experiences that matter most to you. We are committed to protecting the privacy of our Users. We recognize the importance of your privacy and we are committed to ensuring that you are aware of how your Information is being used. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. This Privacy Policy should be read in conjunction and together with the Terms of Use of Aastrika available at https://sphere.aastrika.org/public/tnc.html.

If you do not understand any aspects of our Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us at information@Aastrika.org. Please access/use the Platform only if you agree with our policies and practices encapsulated in this Privacy Policy and the Terms of Use. Your checking the box [or clicking "I Accept"] in the Terms of Use shall constitute your agreement to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

APPLICABILITY OF THE POLICY

This Privacy Policy shall apply to all Information Aastrika collects on the Platform including but not limited to any information you may submit/upload on the Platform and its associated properties like the Aastrika website, mobile applications, chatrooms etc, e-mails that you exchange with Aastrika and other Users/ Creators on the Platform. The Privacy Policy does not apply to, nor does Aastrika take any responsibility for, any information that is collected by any third party either using the Platform or through any links provided on the Platform or through any advertisements featured on the Platform.

Permissions RequiredBy using the Platform and its properties you may be required to consent to provide permissions to Aastrika to use the following:

Microphone - on the Platform, a registered User can choose to include a voice recording while creating User Content and this is stored as part of the relevant User Content.

Access to File Manager - This is used by Aastrika to transfer User Content to and from an external storage device like a pendrive or SD card to an external storage space while creating and consuming content.

NATURE OF INFORMATION COLLECTED AND MANNER OF COLLECTION

As you navigate through the Platform, Aastrika may collect different types of information, collectively hereinafter referred to as "Information". This Information could be of the following types:

  1. "Sensitive Personal Information" - information such as your password (we do not intend to collect any other form of sensitive personal information such as health information of the Users);
  2. "Personally Identifiable Information" - information that could be used to identify you such as your name, email address, age, gender, residential address and other similar information including any User Information;
  3. "Non-Personal Information" - information that cannot be used to identify you such as the webpages that you have viewed and your usage patterns;
  4. "Device Information"- information which is automatically collected about the operating system or version of the system from which the Platform is used.
  1. Aastrika Device Profile -In order to create a customised experience for you, as detailed in the section "Use of your Information", Aastrika generates an anonymised "Device Profile" when you use the Platform from any device as a registered User. Your Device Profile comprises of the information collected about you. Aastrika ensures that your Device Profile is handled securely

Aastrika may also collect information about searches that you have carried out on the Platform, advertisements or third-party links that you have visited, any emails or other correspondence you may have sent or exchanged with other Users or Creators on the Platform or with Aastrika.

You are responsible for ensuring the accuracy of any Information you submit to Aastrika. Inaccurate Information may affect your ability to use the Platform, the Information you receive when using Aastrika, and our ability to contact you. For example, your email address should be kept current because that is one of the primary manners in which we communicate with you.

You understand that the Information collected by Aastrika, may be collected directly or through automatic tracking of your usage of the Platform through the use of cookies or other tracking technologies. The data automatically collected may include usage information such as details of your computing and/or communication device location, connections, or any information that Aastrika may collect through the use of cookies and other tracking technologies. You may decline these cookies by changing your browser settings, if permitted. However, do note that this may impact certain features of the Platform or your experience in using the Platform.

You also may provide Information to be published or displayed or posted on the Platform or transmitted to other Users of the Platform or third parties. Any such Information that is posted or transmitted to other parties will be at your own risk and will not be reviewed or monitored by Aastrika for its content or compliance. Please be aware that Aastrika cannot control the actions of other Users and Creators on the Platform with whom you may choose to share Information with.

USE OF YOUR INFORMATION

The Information that we collect on the Platform will be used for the following purposes:

  1. One of the key purposes for us to collect your Information is to provide you various services with a safe, efficient, smooth and customized experience, including, suggesting relevant Content based on your activity on the Platform, tracking your progress and issuing certificates for courses or training that are provided by the Creators on the Platform.
  2. Verification of your User / Creator account
  3. Aastrika may also need to use your Information to resolve disputes; troubleshoot problems; help promote safe and efficient usage of the Platform; measure interest in the services provided on the Platform; inform you as required; detect and protect you and us against error, fraud and other criminal activity; enforce our Terms of Use or other agreements between us; and as otherwise described to you at the time of collection.
  4. At times, Aastrika may look across multiple Users to identify problems or resolve disputes, and in particular may examine your Information to identify users using multiple User IDs or aliases.
  5. Aastrika may compare and review your Information for errors, omissions and for accuracy.
  6. Aastrika may use your information or data, to analyze the usage of the Platform, improve Platform's content and offerings, and customize Platform's content, layout, and services. These uses improve the Platform and better tailor it to meet your needs, so as to provide you with a smooth, efficient, safe and customized experience while using the site.
  7. Aastrika may use your Information to contact you and deliver information to you with respect to administrative notices, and communications relevant to your use of the Platform. By accepting theTerms of Useincluding the Privacy Policy, you expressly agree to receive this information.
  8. To provide you with newsletters, information, products or Services that you request from us which we feel may interest you, where you have consented to be contacted for such purposes;
  9. To notify you about changes to the Platform, this Privacy Policy or the Terms of Use;
  10. For analytical purposes, including but not limited to assessing usage data, usage patterns, estimate audience sizes and other similar activities;
  11. Aastrika may use third parties that are referred to as internal service providers, including its affiliates, to facilitate or outsource one or more aspects of service operations that are provided to you on the Platform (e.g., search technology, discussion boards, technical services) and therefore Aastrika may provide some of your Information directly to these internal service providers. These internal service providers are subject to confidentiality and other legal restrictions that prohibit their use of the Information provided to them for any purpose other than to facilitate specific Platform related operations.
  12. You understand, agree and acknowledge that the collection, storage and processing of your Information by Aastrika is based on the consent provided by you to this Privacy Policy. You further understand, agree and acknowledge that your Information which is classified as personal information as per applicable laws is considered necessary for us to provide various services on the Platform to you and for your usage of the Platform and other services provided by us in relation to the Platform.
  13. In any other manner we may describe when you provide the Information. Except as otherwise provided herein, no Sensitive Personal Information or Personally Identifiable Information will be published, disclosed or shared with any third party without your express consent.

Please do not include or submit any Sensitive Personal Information or Personally Identifiable Information unless specifically requested by Aastrika as part of registering a User/Creator account or pursuant to other applicable processes. If Aastrika determines that any Information you have provided or uploaded violates the terms of this Privacy Policy, Aastrika has the right, in its absolute discretion, to delete or destroy such Information without incurring any liability to you.

You agree to your Personally Identifiable Information being used by us in order to contact you and deliver information or administrative notices and any other communication relevant to your use of the Platform. If you do not wish to receive these communications, you may at any time inform Aastrika using the e-mail address information@Aastrika.org

DISCLOSURE AND TRANSFER OF YOUR INFORMATION

We consider the confidentiality and security of your Information to be of the utmost importance. We will use industry standard physical, technical and administrative security measures to keep your Information including the Sensitive Personal Information and the Personally Identifiable Information, confidential and secure and will not share it with third parties, except as otherwise provided in this Privacy Policy. By providing any Information on the Platform, you consent to Aastrika providing such Information to any governmental, law enforcement or regulatory authorities who exercise jurisdiction over Aastrika and the Platform, upon receiving an order to do so under applicable law.

We may disclose or/and transfer your Information to our service providers, agents, employees, advisors and affiliates who require the Information for the purposes of operating and maintaining the Platform and for facilitating your use of the Services offered on the Platform.

DATA RETENTION

Aastrika may retain Information, for such length of time as may be required in order for Aastrika to provide the concerned User or the Creator with Services, resolve any disputes that may arise, enforce its rights arising out of agreements with Users, and/or for such period as may be required by legislations/orders of regulatory authorities to which Aastrika is subject.

DATA SECURITY

The Information that you provide, subject to disclosure in accordance with this Privacy Policy and Terms of Use, shall be maintained in a safe and secure manner. Aastrika's databases and Information are stored on secure servers with appropriate firewalls owned by Aastrika or by third parties authorised by Aastrika.

As a registered User or Creator (as the case may be) of the Platform you have the responsibility to ensure data security including that of your User Information. You should use the Platform in a responsible manner. You are solely responsible for all acts done using your User Information.

Given the nature of internet transactions, Aastrika does not take any responsibility for the transmission of Information including the Information you provide to Aastrika. Any transmission of your Information on the internet is done at your risk. Aastrika does not take any responsibility for you or any third party circumventing the privacy settings or security measures adopted by Aastrika.

While Aastrika will use all reasonable efforts to ensure that your Information is safe and secure and it will implement reasonable security measures as required under the applicable laws, it offers no representation, warranties or other assurances that the security measures are adequate, safe, fool proof or impenetrable.

ACCESSING AND UPDATING YOUR INFORMATION

You may review, change, alter or otherwise modify or update your Information including the details you provide for creating the User/ Creator account, at any time by contacting us at information@Aastrika.org.

Do note however, Aastrika reserves the rights to save any Non -Personal, and any Device Information and usage Information, to the extent that it does not qualify as Personal Information, and you are not entitled to seek the deletion of the same. Aastrika at its sole discretion may permit or deny the deletion of any Information, if it is believed the same is required to observe applicable laws.

AGE RESTRICTIONS

The Platform is only intended for Users and Creators who are competent to contract under applicable law. If you are not at least 18 years of age, your parent/guardian will have to provide consent for collection, retention and processing of Sensitive Personal Information by Aastrika. If it comes to Aastrika's attention that any such information pertains to an individual who is not competent to contract under applicable law, such Information may be deleted without notice to you

COMPLAINTS

If you wish to place a complaint or raise a question/ concern with regard to your privacy requirements, or otherwise view, modify, delete or correct any of your Personally Identifiable Information or Sensitive Personal Information, please contact our Grievance Redressal Officer, at 147/J, Ground Floor, 10th Cross, 12th Main Rd, 3rd Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560034, Phone : + 91 80 4146 4004, or at privacy@aastrika.org so that we can consider and respond to your request/complaint. We shall address all requests/complaints within thirty (30) days from the date of such a request/complaint being made.

AMENDMENTS TO THE PRIVACY POLICY

This Privacy Policy is subject to change at Aastrika's sole discretion. Any changes to the Privacy Policy will be notified by a notice on the home page https://sphere.aastrika.org/public/tnc. We encourage you to check this page periodically for modifications or revisions to the Privacy Policy to understand how it affects the use of your information. We will not be responsible for your failure to remain informed about such changes. However, we will obtain your consent prior to any material changes pertaining to your Sensitive Personal Information.

TERMS OF USE

This Privacy Policy shall form a part of the Terms of Use.

Copyright AastrikaUrmika Health Systems Pvt Ltd 2021
